summary:
Adds 2 new standalone and complete Light Armor sets to the Game
 for Stormcloak and Imperial Archers.
And more is coming...
descriptionHtml:
[URL=http://www.pic-upload.de/view-19362475/Logo_small.jpg.html][IMG]http://www10.pic-upload.de/17.05.13/1gx6enm9vgt.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

This is a Nexus Exclusive Mod, don\'t reupload it anywhere!

Marksman Armor by Witcher5688
Version: 1.0
Date: 17.05.2013
Category: Armour
Author: Witcher5688
Source: /mods/36148

I. Introduction
II. Permission Notes
III. Requirements
IV. Credits
V. Recommended
VI. Reviews
VII. Special Thanks- Beta Tester
VIII. Changelog
IX. Bugs


I. Introduction
This mod gives you 2 new Armor sets.
Included is:
1 Helmet
2 Types of Gloves
2 Types of Boots
2 Types of Armor, Stormcloak and Imperial Style

Everything is Temperable and Craftable on a Forge, leather Category. 
You don\'t need a smithing perk for this.

II. Permission Notes
If you want to use this mod for your own mod, pls ask before using the models and textures.
I won\'t give permissions for a reupload, pls don\'t ask or do it.
If you want to create a translation, you don\'t need my permission. Just upload your translated
 esp without the models and textures.

III. Requirements
Latest Skyrim Patch

IV. Credits
ActusReus for the Helmet mesh, Stormcloak texture and Helmet textures
Rafuel for creating the texture for the Imperial armor
taro8 for the Hold armor textures, wich will added with the next update
AlphaWolf for Witcher Textures and models
LordofWar for Witcher Textures and models

V. Recommended
Immersive Armors
http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733
Immersive Weapons
http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27644
Newerminds Bow Collection
http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12276

VI. Reviews

VII. Special Thanks- Beta Tester
feenixfly- Beta Tester
andreamkall- Beta Tester
Doffa- Beta Tester
tgpomy- Beta Tester

VIII. Changelog:
1.0- Release

IX. Bugs
Bug: Medium game settings will gives you some bad textures.
Fix: Change the game settings from medium to high.
author: Witcher5688
